comments:
Build: TPTP-4.2.0-200602130100

Test suite: Platform.UI.Perspective.Launch
Test case: Attach_Local_Test_Connection_Error_1

Steps: 
  >Start RAC service
  >In a command prompt in the test class directory
  Run "java -XrunpiAgent:server=controlled HelloWorld"
  >In workbench, switch to profile perspective
  >Select profile button from the tool bar
  >Select 'Local Direct Connection' on the Hosts tab, then click on the Agents tab
  >Verify that no agents are shown.

Result: when clicking the Agents tab, an error message pop-up (see attachment). In the Eclipse .log file, following exception has been logged:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-02-13 17:35:20.843

Do you have RAC or the new AC controller running ? If so, which one ?
I am using the new AC, which was download from the same build: TPTP-4.2.0-200602130100
This error mesg pertains to the IAC.
This is caused by a version mismatch between Eclipse Platform and TPTP. The M5 driver has some public Eclipse API removed (which exist in M4) and caused IAC to fix its code to M5 based.
